Defining new Property Indices

To define a new property-based index use the "Define new Property ..." button located in menu "Options/Managing Property-based Indices" which will launch the following window:

Define new Property Index Window

In the panel "Property List" is possible to add or delete an index using the () and () buttons respectively. In the panel "Residue Values" it possible to edit the values assigned to each residue. For saving changes use the save button.

Selection of Properties-based indices

To select a new property-based index use the "Select new Property ..." button located in the menu "Options/Managing Property-based Indices" or "Other Properties Indices..." option located at the end of Indices panel, in both cases the following window will be launched:

Select Property Index Window

In the panel "Property List" all properties are listed. In addition you can use the ( ), (ALL) and ( ) buttons to select them.
